title: Call for Entries for freeware and shareware font directory
content:
Debut Publications Ltd are pleased to announce a ‘Call for Entries’ for  
our forthcoming [freeware](http://web.archive.org/wiki/freeware) and [shareware](http://web.archive.org/wiki/shareware) font directory.

The directory will be an accessible resource for designers and industry  
creatives, showcasing the very best of contemporary downloadable fonts. By  
taking an innovative approach to the layout and ‘feel’ of the publication,  
fonts will be displayed in an easy view index including designer’s  
credits, information on variations within the family, platforms available  
and a direct URL enabling the user to download the font and access futher  
fonts from the same source. Any freeware or shareware font is eligible for  
inclusion. We will endeavour to publish as many submissions as possible to  
ensure the directory is as extensive and as diverse as possible.

For a full brief, Terms & Conditions and to download an entry form, please  
visit: [www.debutpublications.co.uk/forms/fsforms.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329211753/http:/www.debutpublications.co.uk/forms/fsforms.pdf)

The deadline for all submissions is 31st October 2005.

For more information please email: [info@debutpublications.co.uk](mailto:info@debutpublications.co.uk) or write  
to Debut Publications Ltd, Creative Industries Centre, Wolverhampton  
Science Park, Wolverhampton. WV10 9TG.

- Debut Team.

Debut Publications Ltd are supported by SP/ARK and PLOT  
For more information please visit:  
 [http://www.wolverhamptonsp.co.uk/spark](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329211753/http:/www.wolverhamptonsp.co.uk/spark)  
 [http://www.plotonline.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/)
author: dan_reynolds : 13 August, 2005 - 9:49am

comments.content:
This book is now available. Click [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329211753/http:/www.debutpublications.co.uk/) to order it.
